attachments.title: Why you shouldn't buy Amazon's programmable IoT Dash button
attachments.text: The new Amazon Iot Dash button seems great in theory, but be careful what you use it for or you might be quickly out of $20.
attachments.fallback: The Next Web: Why you shouldn't buy Amazon's programmable IoT Dash button

text: So she basically says $20 isn't worth it for just 1000 pushes. But I think if you account for how easy and flexible they are to use and that it's a new offering, the price makes more sense.
